desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージが増加し、ＨＰがかなり回復＆被ダメージ時ＢＢゲージが少し増加し、確率でＨＰが回復する

dictionary.lore: A demonic Phoenix Crown found in the ruins of the Agni Empire. Vermilion, the emperor at the time, ordered his best blacksmith to create this crown by using forbidden demonic arts. Many suffered due to various plagues and diseases that ravaged the country before its completion, but it eventually came to be called a masterpiece of the highest quality due to its ability to bring its wearer's potential to extreme limits. It is said that as its name suggests, no matter how many times the wearer is taken down, they will rise like the phoenix once again.

name: 魔鳳冠ヴァーミリオン
